text:
Message 353 of 4024
I NEVER enter the Kirkland house without your permission for any reason. And I won’t do that today.
I just need to get the snow blower so I am not trapped. Can you please put it in the driveway.
Sent:01/11/2024 at 04:05 PM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 01/11/2024 at 04:10 PM)
Subject:Re: Snow Blower
Message 354 of 4024
Ok...
so if something happens to me. An emergency for example, you are knowingly and intentionally taking away the only way I can get medical aide.
I don’t understand that, especially if you don’t use it at all, and I have no need to enter our Kirkland home, but that seems like your final decision.
Sent:01/11/2024 at 04:41 PM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 01/11/2024 at 05:08 PM)
Subject:Re: Snow Blower
Message 355 of 4024
Does not seem like you are responding. Is there any chance we can chat for a few minutes? I don’t want an already awful situation to get even worse.
We really worked well as a team this week. Then we fought Tuesday night due to miscommunication. So I stepped back for a day to give you space.
I heard what you said, I disagreed, but know now fighting will only lead to a shittier situation for both of us and as a result will then impact our kids.
Please just share what’s up. I’m happy to stay backed off like yesterday. I listen and do my best. But if you don’t tell me, I don’t know what to correct.
Please, let’s not repeat that pattern. It’s cost so much.
Sent:01/11/2024 at 06:06 PM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 01/12/2024 at 08:52 AM)
Subject:Communication
Message 356 of 4024
Will you please respond?
Sent:01/12/2024 at 08:55 AM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 01/12/2024 at 08:58 AM)
Subject:Re: Communication
